--Deb

messages.messageBody:
I have finally gotten down to this book on my list of books to buy and read.
I cant find it anywhere. Do i have the name correct? Or can you not get
this at someplace like Amazon? Thanks in advance

~Alyssa IL

"Work like you don't need the money, love like you've never been hurt, and
dance like you do when nobody's watching."











[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
